https://tmrev.io/movie/364369-.hack//Legend of the Twilight: Let's Meet Offline 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oUPnA8ttp4wJVC3jlbcUvhcsVLJ.jpg It's a short story about the characters from .hack// Legend of the Twilight meeting offline. It's more to hear than to see. It shows only backgrounds from the real world with the heads of the charater-game-avatars; but it reveals some interesting real life information about the characters. Sound Drama from .hack//Legend of the Twilight Bracelet, can be found on Disk 1 of the .hack Integration + Liminality Vol. 1-4 DVD box set. .hack//Legend of the Twilight: Let's Meet Offline
